channel.title: Suggestion: The two kings game (re: How to make king’s faction not the game deciding factor)
channel.description:
I've thought of another way to make the game not decided by the king faction: 2 kings!
Why we need this? https://forum.imperium42.com/t/how-to-make-kings-faction-not-the-game-deciding-factor/55580
Also, to make a game more about deception and less about keeping good logs. choosing the right king and not ust randomly getting an evil king.
The idea: At the start of the game, there will be 2 kings, one of them is "fake", and the other is good (1,16 posiotions) This could be in every game of some of them.
**Abilities:** **passives:** 1) immune to deaths first 3 nights 2) all the current king's passive
**day **abilities**:** **defile** (starting evil king only): when a player die at day, change the way he his apeared to the court. (2 uses)
**Night abilities:** **Allies**: check if a player is cult/unseen (1 use, only useable on first 3 nights) **Speech**: talk with 2 players at night
**Election:** At the beggining of day 4 (can be day 5 too) the town will have an election, and vote for the king who stays at the game. The losing king will be executed. His identity won't be revealed until the new king dies. the day won't end after the election.
**The new king abilities:** **passive**: current king's passive, the new king can't be voted out of the game, can't be poisioned by butler, for the first 3 days after the election unless he executed a blue dragon player. **day**: royal finger, defile (evil only) **night**: 4 guards: 2 order execution.

item.title: Suggestion: The two kings game (re: How to make king’s faction not the game deciding factor)
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Eran_Shmuel:

But you can’t hang the king after the election or 3 days

It’s still don’t answering to my question even if you survive as King then what? Without confirming yourself as Good King noone would care what do you have to say and worse noone would cooperate with you at all.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Twil1ight:

Well how you can say balance when this would totally make a King class SO unfun since in 80% would probably hang you just because why not?

But you can’t hang the king after the election or 3 days… so not before day 7 unless he exed a bd player

Read full topic

Well how you can say balance when this would totally make a King class SO unfun since in 80% would probably hang you just because why not? Making a Meta is not a solution to any problem, also your idea don’t even a strong core since most your changes are very debatable even some of them are just bad. How you can make something from nothing?

item.title: Suggestion: The two kings game (re: How to make king’s faction not the game deciding factor)
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Wellt it’s imposible since a class can’t have more than 2 passives

They do it all the time, just combine few passive in one passive.

“Don’t trust starting King’s” Meta.

It’s doesnt metter as long as the game is balanced. You can also buff the king since the game won’t be decided by a 65% head coin anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion: The two kings game (re: How to make king’s faction not the game deciding factor)

item.title: Suggestion: The two kings game (re: How to make king’s faction not the game deciding factor)
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Eran_Shmuel:

all the current king’s passive

Eran_Shmuel:

passive: current king’s passive, the new king can’t be voted out of the game, can’t be poisioned by butler, for the first 3 days after the election unless he executed a blue dragon player.

Wellt it’s imposible since a class can’t have more than 2 passives and the Devs clearly said they never change this so it’s this passive and swap with something else or nothin’.

Sorry but even if the change would be inplemented into the game, your hopes and preditions won’t go your way since every player is different and because of that some people might just play as they want and will turn out making “Don’t trust starting King’s” Meta.

Read full topic
